source: TEXT_STMBDY104_02922_SEQ_00<tab>Your body odor has caught Sumitsubo's attention.
target: TEXT_STMBDY104_02922_SEQ_00<tab>碧のタマミズのスミツボは、冒険者に「刺突漁」について教えたいようだ。
TEXT_STMBDY104_02922_TODO_00<tab>魚を探すコウジン族と話す

source: TEXT_STMBDY104_02922_SUMITSUBO_000_000<tab>Hmm...? <sniff> You smell of fish. Does this mean, then, that you're a fisher from above?
target:
TEXT_STMBDY104_02922_SUMITSUBO_000_000おんやぁ～、君の身体から、魚の匂いがプンプンするぞぉ～。
さては、そうとうの魚獲り名人と見たぁ～！

source: TEXT_STMBDY104_02922_SUMITSUBO_000_001<tab>If you enjoy hunting fish up there, then I'm sure you would take pleasure in hunting them down here as well.
target:
TEXT_STMBDY104_02922_SUMITSUBO_000_001君、水中に潜るためのおまじないは受けたんだろぉ～？
魚を獲るのが好きなんだったら、水の上だけじゃなくて、
水の中でも、魚を獲れるようになりたいと思わないか～い？

source: TEXT_STMBDY104_02922_SUMITSUBO_000_002<tab>You cannot use rods and reels underwater, though. No, you will need a spear to strike your prey swiftly and silently like the Kojin. I suppose you would call it...spearfishing?
target:
TEXT_STMBDY104_02922_SUMITSUBO_000_002僕たちは、「銛」を使って魚を獲るんだけどさぁ～。
水中に潜れるんなら、君も「刺突漁」ができるんじゃないかなぁ～。

source: TEXT_STMBDY104_02922_SUMITSUBO_000_003<tab>Would you like a lesson in spearfishing? If you should see any of my Blue brothers outside, I'm sure they would be glad to show you how it's done.
target:
TEXT_STMBDY104_02922_SUMITSUBO_000_003ちょうど今、仲間が北西の方角に魚を獲りに出てるから、
「銛」に興味があるなら、使い方を聞いてみればぁ～？
「魚を探すコウジン族」がいるはずだよぉ～。

source: TEXT_STMBDY104_02922_SUMITSUBO_000_010<tab>A hunter who smells of fish like you should take to spearfishing like Kojin to water. I'm certain my Blue brothers would be more than happy to show you how.
target:
TEXT_STMBDY104_02922_SUMITSUBO_000_010「銛」に興味があるなら、北西の方角で、
「魚を探すコウジン族」に聞いてみなぁ～。
君ほどの魚獲り名人なら、「銛」もすぐに扱えるさぁ～。

source: TEXT_STMBDY104_02922_KOUJIN02922_000_020<tab>You wish to hunt fish with a spear? Why, it's as easy as breathing underwater. And considering you're not blue in the face, I can tell you will master this skill in no time at all.
target:
TEXT_STMBDY104_02922_KOUJIN02922_000_020「銛」の使い方を知りたいってぇ～？
ふ～ん、キミ、オイラたちみたいに水中を泳げるんだぁ～。
そんなら、「刺突漁」もできるかもねぇ～。

source: TEXT_STMBDY104_02922_KOUJIN02922_000_021<tab>First, you will need to search for where fish gather. When you've found a suitable school of fish, steady your spear and strike with a quick and fluid thrust.
target:
TEXT_STMBDY104_02922_KOUJIN02922_000_021水中では、魚の集まる場所を探すのが大事なんだぁ～。
うまく場所を見つけられたら、そこで「銛」を構えてぇ～、
目の前に魚が来たら、や～っ！！　って突くんだよぉ～。

source: TEXT_STMBDY104_02922_KOUJIN02922_000_022<tab>That, in a clamshell, is the art of spearfishing. Of course, these explanations mean nothing if you have no spear to practice. Here, take one of mine.
target:
TEXT_STMBDY104_02922_KOUJIN02922_000_022「銛」の使い方は、大体そんな感じぃ～。
余ってる「銛」の道具があるから、キミもやってみなよぉ～！

source: TEXT_STMBDY104_02922_KOUJIN02922_000_023<tab>If you look around, you're like to find promising prey close by. Farewell, friend, and happy hunting.
target:
TEXT_STMBDY104_02922_KOUJIN02922_000_023ちょうど、この辺は魚がよく集まる場所だからぁ～、
ここで、「刺突漁」を試してみるといいかもぉ～！
それじゃ、がんばってねぇ～！

source: TEXT_STMBDY104_02922_SYSTEM_000_050<tab>You are now able to obtain fish via spearfishing. In order to do so, you must first equip a spearfishing gig as your secondary tool.
target:
TEXT_STMBDY104_02922_SYSTEM_000_050銛を使った、水中での採集「刺突漁」が可能となりました！
副道具の「」を装備することで、
水中での採集を行えるようになります。

source: TEXT_STMBDY104_02922_SYSTEM_100_050<tab>Please note that there are three types of gig heads that may be used, each of which is specialized for catching different kinds of fish.
target:
TEXT_STMBDY104_02922_SYSTEM_100_050水中の、魚が集まって潜んでいる場所を「漁場」といいます。
「漁場」は、アクション「ファゾム」を使用することで、
見えるようになります。

source: TEXT_STMBDY104_02922_SYSTEM_000_051<tab>By using the action Fathom, you will be able to locate teeming waters as you explore the ocean. These locations require spearfishing to catch fish.
target:
TEXT_STMBDY104_02922_SYSTEM_000_051水中で、魚の集まる「漁場」を見つけたら、
「漁場」にアクセスすることで刺突漁を開始できます。
